content: रमण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [रमयति रम्-णिच् ल्यु ल्युट् वा] Pleasing, gratifying, delightful, charming; <ls>Bk. 6. 72.</ls> --णः {@--1@} A lover, husband; प्रायेणैते रमणविरहेष्वंगनानां विनोदाः <ls>Me. 87</ls>, <ls n="Me.">37</ls>; पप्रच्छ रामां रमणोऽभिलाषं <ls>R. 14. 27</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 21</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 60.</ls> {@--2@} The god of love. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Aruṇa. {@--4@} An ass. {@--5@} A testicle. --णं {@--1@} Sporting. {@--2@} Dalliance, pastime, amorous sport. {@--3@} Love, sexual union. {@--4@} Joy or pleasure in general. {@--5@} The hip and the loins.

रमणी {@--1@} A lovely young woman, लता रम्या सेयं भ्रमरकुलरम्या न रमणी <ls>Bv. 2. 90.</ls> {@--2@} A wife, mistress; भोगः को रमणीं विना <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--3@} A woman in general. {@--4@} The aloe tree.
